Rewards Rate: 5 CRED Points/₹100 for E-commerce Transactions, CRED UPI, and Transactions at CRED Store, CRED Travel, and CRED Pay
Reward Redemption: 1 CRED Point = ₹1 for Flight and Hotel Bookings Via CRED, CRED Store, and at Various CRED Merchants. 1 CRED Point = ₹0.50 for Bill Payments Via CRED

fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% Fuel Surcharge Waiver for Transactions Between ₹500 and ₹5,000

product_details: The CRED IndusInd Bank RuPay Credit Card is the first co-branded offering by CRED, a popular credit card bill payment platform.
This card is most suited for e-commerce and UPI transactions.
Cardholders shall earn 5 CRED Points/₹100 spent for e-commerce transactions, CRED UPI, CRED Store, CRED Pay, and CRED Travel.
Even utilities and insurance will be eligible to earn 1 CRED Point for every ₹100 spent.
